text: Austrochthonius insularis is a species of pseudoscorpions in the family Chthoniidae. == Distribution == The species is endemic to the Crozet Islands in the French Southern and Antarctic Lands. == Original publication == * Vitali-di Castri, 1968 : Austrochthonius insularis, nouvelle espèce de pseudoscorpions de l'archipel des Crozet (Heterosphyronida, Chthoniidae). Bulletin du Muséum National d'Histoire Naturelle, Paris, ser. 2, vol. 40, . == External links == * Catalogue of Life : Austrochthonius insularis Vitali-di Castri, 1968 * Category:Crozet Islands Category:Chthonioidea Category:Chthoniidae
title: Austrochthonius insularis
